MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath, affecting properties in Viewfield Terrace and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.52pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network checks required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:24PM on Friday 23 October 2020.
